
dom_size(+Dom, ?Size)

   Size is the number of elements in the domain Dom.



Arguments
   +Dom                A finite domain.
   ?Size               An integer or a variable.

Type
   library(fd)

Description
   Size is the number of elements in the domain Dom.




Resatisfiable
      No.

Fail Conditions
      None.



See Also
   dom_check_in / 2, dom_range / 3, dvar_domain / 2
